description: Your Everton Q&A with BBC Sport and BBC Radio Merseyside
title: Your Everton Q&A
title_page: Your Everton Q&A with BBC Sport and BBC Radio Merseyside - BBC Sport
maintext:
We asked you to submit your pre-season questions for an insider view on Everton.
Over the course of Monday, BBC Radio Merseyside's Mike Hughes will be combing through them and giving his take on how this season is shaping up for the Toffees.
